title: VAYNE can 1 vs 5 NOT OP AT ALL!
body:
Name me 1 other adc that can 1 vs 5 and live when fed?

ANSWER = NO OTHER ADC CAN! NO MATTER HOW FED ANOTHER ADC IS THEY WON'T BE ABLE TO 1 VS 5

VAYNE CAN! 

NOT OP AT ALL RIOT! 

GG!

replies.body: No, ENEMY Dravens can 1v10. The Draven on my team can juuust about verse 10 minionsâ€¦ Every. Time. :P

If she's fed enough.

Under that logic, one team should have Jinx, Kalista, Vayne, Draven and Nasus/whatev because they can all potentially 1v5 because if they get fed it's GG. The part where they don't get fed doesn't exist.

Kalista

get enough stacks in whilst not taking any damge from hoping around

Kalista can do that too, in fact every adc in the game can as long as u position yourself properly and outplay your opponents although it would be extremely difficult to pull it off if the adc you are playing is immobile.
You didnt just watch the best adc in oceania get wrecked on vayne did you?

> Name me 1 other adc that can 1 vs 5 and live when fed?

Quinn. I've done so on several occasions. Now quite your whining.
